dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5278 IH: Preventing Presidential Election Interference Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lieu (for himself, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Mr. Swalwell, Ms. Jayapal, and Ms. Norton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit executive branch officials from engaging in election interference, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Presidential Election Interference Act.

section.header: Interference by executive branch officials and government employees
section.text: Section 595 of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by inserting a President or Vice President or before administrative employees;
by inserting a President or Vice President, or before a person employed; and
by striking or imprisoned not more than one year, and inserting or imprisoned not more than 3 years,.

section.text: Section 610 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by inserting after for any person the following: , including a President or Vice President,.
